Title: SharePoint Silverlight Slideshow
Description: This is a SharePoint Wrapper Webpart for the Silverlight Slideshow webpart also on codeplex. Uses Silverlight to display pictures from a SharePoint Pictures Library.
HomeWiki:
Project Description
This is a SharePoint Wrapper Webpart for the Silverlight Slideshow webpart also on codeplex. Uses Silverlight to display pictures from a SharePoint Pictures Library.


Instructions about this webpart can be found here:
Deploy It yourself Part 1 http://www.sharepointevolved.com/2009/01/04/using-silverlight-slideshow-and-a-sharepoint-picture-librarypart1/
Deploy It yourself Part 2 http://www.sharepointevolved.com/2009/01/05/using-silverlight-slideshow-and-a-sharepoint-picture-librarypart2/
Easy To Deploy Installer/Assembly http://www.sharepointevolved.com/2009/01/10/silverlight-slideshow-in-an-easy-to-deploy-webpart/

SharePoint Silverlight Slideshow Postshttp://www.sharepointevolved.com/category/silverlight-slideshow/

This project is a SharePoint Web Part wrapper for this CodePlex Project http://silverlightslideshow.codeplex.com/
